    • Field Detail

      • MPU6050_RA_PWR_MGMT_1

        public static final byte MPU6050_RA_PWR_MGMT_1
        Just wakes the device up, because it sets the sleep bit to 0. Also sets the clock source to internal.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MPU6050_RA_GYRO_CONFIG

        public static final byte MPU6050_RA_GYRO_CONFIG
        Sets the full scale range of the gyroscopes to ± 2000 °/s
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MPU6050_RA_SMPLRT_DIV

        public static final byte MPU6050_RA_SMPLRT_DIV
        Sets the smaple rate divider for the gyroscopes and accelerometers. This means
        acc-rate = 1kHz / 1+ sample-rate
        and
        gyro-rate = 8kHz / 1+ sample-rate.

        The concrete value 0 leaves the sample rate on default, which means 1kHz for acc-rate and 8kHz for gyr-rate.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MPU6050_RA_CONFIG

        public static final byte MPU6050_RA_CONFIG
        Setting the digital low pass filter to
        Acc Bandwidth (Hz) = 184
        Acc Delay (ms) = 2.0
        Gyro Bandwidth (Hz) = 188
        Gyro Delay (ms) = 1.9
        Fs (kHz) = 1
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
